text: Mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨci hulaŋ lɨmɨn sɨbɨlɨ ulaŋ hɨvɨ hɨniavɨdaci migɨladami agaŋ Polɨ dɨdaŋ Sailasɨ dɨdaŋ likɨla nudɨ ulaŋ hɨvɨ via uavɨla nulɨsaŋ sɨmɨŋ igunami. Lavɨla hulaŋ lɨmɨn sɨbɨlɨ ulaŋ hɨvɨ hɨniavɨdaci migɨladami agaŋ nudɨ ulaŋ pam hɨsɨŋ agɨlaŋ hula Asɨ saŋ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lamavɨmi agasaŋ hɨjɨŋalaŋala hɨniavɨmi.Polɨ hula Sailasɨ hula Asɨ dɨ aba aba sɨhɨ iahaiaha hɨniavɨmi. Polɨ dɨ Sailasɨ dɨ fim agɨladɨ mɨŋahusami.
